```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.linalg import fractional_matrix_power
>>> a = np.array([[1.0, 3.0], [1.0, 4.0]])
>>> b = fractional_matrix_power(a, 0.5)
>>> b
array([[ 0.75592895,  1.13389342],
 [ 0.37796447,  1.88982237]])
>>> np.dot(b, b)      # Verify square root
array([[ 1.,  3.],
 [ 1.,  4.]]) 
```
